snippet: The charges against Alexandru Visinescu are part of Romania’s efforts to grapple with its Communist past by bringing to justice former commanders who enabled a brutal police state.
abstract: Romanian prosecutors charge Alexandru Visinescu, commander of Communist-era prison, with genocide.
lead_paragraph: The charges against Alexandru Visinescu are part of Romania’s efforts to grapple with its Communist past by bringing to justice former commanders who enabled a brutal police state.

headline.print_headline:
Romania: Ex-Prison Chief Charged
With Genocide in Treatment of Inmates
